body: Teterun, you fucked bastard. You never fail to amaze me.
The monster part was a turn off for me too, but everything else was hot❤. Loved the futa centaur.

Teterun is probably my favorite hentai artist, and if this were just about a futa centaur fucking a bbw I would probably LOVE IT, but the tentacle monster pseudo-gore just ruins it. I hope Teterun eventually revisits the futa centaur concept but without any of the other stuff, perhaps as a sequel to his "Maouzoku no Oko to" comic (the elf girl one).
You'll be doing all of us a favor if u do.
i see ur trying some new things. The Centaur with the huge ass sexy beautiful fluffy titties. Caught my attention completely please English dub please.
I agree the monster part is too much
sometimes hentai goes 2 far. this is one of those times.
